languageKey.label: Define header template: Set path to a file whose content is loaded in the header and defines how Aloha editing looks like and works.

Define the save method: There are different ways how content is saved into the database. None: Nothing will be saved into the database. Use this for demonstrations. Direct: Every change will be directly saved into the database. Intermediate: Changes will be saved when pressing the save button.
